## What's Changed
* Pin BCR presubmit CI to Bazel 6.4.0 by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/824
* Produce an alias for an xcframework's `ios_sim_arm64` slice if available by @jszumski in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/810
* Ensure -import-underlying-module gets into the generated Xcode project by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/825

## What's Changed
* Add `toolchains` to rules that use `@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain_type` by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/807
* Add BAZEL_DIAGNOSTICS_DIR to proj_settings_base by @AngelaGuardia in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/809
* [xcodeproj] Bumping xcode gen for arm64 by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/812
* Fix usage of apple_api_version by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/814
* Allow frameworks parameter to be used in ios_application by @codeman9 in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/819
* Allow select in test_host parameter by @codeman9 in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/820

## What's Changed
* Add docs on BCR publishing by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/792
* Allow Bazel 6 users to explicitly opt-in to rules_apple 2.x by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/793
* Remove missing `output_discriminator` attribute usage by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/796
* Conditionally handle `--apple_compiler` & `--apple_grte_top` by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/798
* Decouple CI & remote cache config by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/799
* Update precompiled_apple_resource_bundle to not include executable_name by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/801


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/3.1.0...3.1.1

## What's Changed
* Update from Bazel 6.1.2 to Bazel 6.3.2 by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/777
* Move to using `write_file` from Bazel Skylib by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/778
* Fix marking of development dependencies by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/782
* Update stardoc for bzlmod by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/776
* Support rules_apple 3.x.x by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/773
* Update dependencies and use latest archives by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/784
* Add Bazel central registry files by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/780

## What's Changed
* Fix GitHub workflows names by @ob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/1

* Nest hmap tools under their own package by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/4
* Initial implementation of the ios rules by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/7
* Update README and add dependencies by @ob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/8
* Add support for specifying a swift_version by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/9
* Allow packaging empty frameworks, and skipping certain parts of packaging by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/11
* Properly handle completely non-exported / "project" headers by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/12
* Use a filegroup for resources by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/14
* Use a custom rule for resource filegroups by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/15
* Allow customizing which resource extensions are filtered by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/16
* Add iOS 13 test hosts by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/17
* Allow headers in test bundles /apps to be imported the same as in Xcode by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/18
* Consolidate to a single workflow for testing master & PRs by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/25
* Add a clean action to framework rule by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/24
* Handle empty frameworks by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/26
* Initial implementation of a simple xcode project generation rule by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/21
* Add support for deriving copts from apple_library xcconfig param by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/23
* Generate modulemaps for frameworks with only ObjC sources by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/27
* Split out tests into multiple different github actions by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/28
* Pass visibility arg to test rule, not library rule by @amberdixon in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/29
* Address feedback from PR 21 for installer script by @amberdixon in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/30
* Handle podspecs that identify their swift_version supported as 5.1 by @justinseanmartin in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/32
* Add Jetbrains .idea file to .gitignore by @wileykestner in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/34
* Add resources to ios_unit_test kwargs by @wileykestner in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/36
* Enable Objective-C files in mixed-source frameworks to import the generated Swift header by @wileykestner in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/38
* Refactor Xcodeproject generation code. Add in xcode scheme test action env vars and command line args. by @amberdixon in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/37
* Actually prepend copts so they get passed to tools by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/40
* Refer to actual generated swift header when making swift hmap by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/48
* Remove background color from default test host app by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/46
* Update bazel version to 3.0.0 and latest rules  by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/45
* Add support for specifying a dict of infoplist values by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/47
* Fix swift's clang importer being able to see hmaps by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/51
* Avoid generating a CompileAssetCatalog build phase by @amberdixon in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/43
* Pass 'app_icons' to rules_apple's ios_application by @jschear in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/54
* Add target.info to list of all dependent targets by @amberdixon in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/56
* Fix a small typo in README.md by @jschear in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/57
* Use Swift info provider during framework packaging to avoid symbol redefinition by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/53
* Mixed module fixes by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/60
* Copy compilation context from objc provider to CcInfo by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/59
* NFC: Cleanups by @ob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/61
* Add a more concise input format for header maps by @ob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/52

* Remove dependency of `jq` util by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/63
* Fix "module not found" when using prebuilt binaries + added prebuilt_framework_importer.bzl by @acecilia in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/58

* Update to bazel 3.2 by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/68
* Adds a build wrapper script for Bazel build processing by @ndizazzo in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/70
* Remove test_host from list of deps to avoid including extra sources during compile sources phase by @ndizazzo in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/71

* Build frameworks/resource_bundles behind a transition by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/73
* Pass tags attr through to app & test targets by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/76
* Pass data to swift_library when relevant by @barbasevich in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/75
* Generated xcodeproj improvements by @segiddins in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/77
